rows.label: qst712002_msg0001
rows.name:
Something wrong? You're looking
a bit perplexed. Aren't you pros?

rows.label: qst712002_msg0002
rows.name:
You want a refresher on stage-three
Blade Combos? Oh, all right then...

rows.label: qst712002_msg0003
rows.name:
Blade Combos are performed by using
one Special after another. That's the
same for stage three as it was for two.

rows.label: qst712002_msg0004
rows.name:
For the three stages, you'll need to use
a Special that's at least level 1, 2 and 3
respectively. That's the basic principle.

rows.label: qst712002_msg0005
rows.name:
Also, since you've cleared my first trial,
I think I told you about critical routes
already, right?

rows.label: qst712002_msg0006
rows.name:
A critical route is what we call a special
Blade Combo that follows a particular
element sequence.

rows.label: qst712002_msg0007
rows.name:
The one I know is Fire, Fire, then Light.
Do that one, and you'll deal much more
damage than with just a normal combo.

rows.label: qst712002_msg0008
rows.name:
But there are plenty of other critical
routes to discover. I'm hoping you'll
take this chance to experiment a little.

rows.label: qst712002_msg0009
rows.name:
Ah, don't worry though. Critical routes
aren't really part of today's test, so I
won't grade you on that.

rows.label: qst712002_msg0010
rows.name:
Basically, I don't really mind what
Blade Combos you pull off, as long
as you can reach the third stage.

rows.label: qst712002_msg0011
rows.name:
As before, you can pick the place,
time, and target.

rows.label: qst712002_msg0102
rows.name:
I knew you were good, but I really
thought that last part would be too
much for you.

rows.label: qst712002_msg0103
rows.name:
Nobody's even come close to the
level of skill you command.

rows.label: qst712002_msg0104
rows.name:
I'm going to let Gororo make the final
decision, but I'm convinced that he'll
take a liking to you.

rows.label: qst712002_msg0105
rows.name:
We've arranged to rendezvous in the
region of Aletta, in Iira.

rows.label: qst712002_msg0106
rows.name:
Drop by when you have time and
we can sort things out from there.
